GapFillDragDrop.Title: Wordspot: take
GapFillDragDrop.Instruction: Choose an answer and drag it to the correct place.

Content.Question:
1. Sue’s going to take her driving test next week.
2. I’d like to take a picture of everyone together.
3. We could go by car or take a train.
4. Ken took off his coat and sat down.
5. Who do you take after, your mother or your father?
6. When Diana’s boss went to hospital, she had to take over his job.
7. I’ve just taken up riding and I really like it.
8. I couldn’t come to class. Did you take any notes?
9. You’ve been working too hard. You need to take a holiday.
10. Sam used to take part in plays when he was at school.
11. Our neighbour took care of our cat while we were on holiday.
12. Don took me out for a meal at that new Italian restaurant.
